INTRODUCTION K e y p u b l i c a t i o n s o f t h e E u r o p e a n U n i o n 2 0 1 1 004 Introduction Key publications of the European Union is a catalogue presenting a selection of priced and free-of-charge publications published by the Publications Office, the European Union’s publisher. It is a booklet promoting the most recent and most popular titles of the EU institutions and other bodies, including: (cid:132) the Official Jounal of the European Union , the flagship publication, indicating the content and the various subscription options; (cid:132) many titles covering European Union legislation; (cid:132) books and booklets about the environment, economy and finance, education and culture; and (cid:132) publications offering statistics on a wide range of subjects. Entries for each publication indicate the title, the subtitle, a short description of the content, language availability, bibliographical information (year of publication, number of pages, format, ISBN and catalogue number) and price. The structure of this catalogue is organised by theme — see the list on page 5. For easier searching, you will find two indexes: thematic and alphabetical. The language versions that are available for a publication are listed, using the following abbreviations for the official languages of the European Union: BG Bulgarian ES Spanish CS Czech DA Danish DE German ET Estonian EL Greek EN English FR French GA Irish IT Italian LV Latvian LT Lithuanian HU Hungarian MT Maltese NL Dutch PL Polish PT Portuguese RO Romanian SK Slovak SL Slovenian FI Finnish SV Swedish The prices of publications are given in euro but do not include VAT and postage and packing.
